entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:15 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
